CONNECTIONS_SUBTITLE: Find your squad, challenge your rivals. Loyalty not guaranteed.
GAME_TAGLINE_LINE1: Respect is earned, one smash at a time. 💥🏓
GAME_TAGLINE_LINE2: Miss the ball? That’s a crime. 🚨🤦‍♂️
GAME_TAGLINE_LINE3: Lose the match? Say goodbye to your pride. 👋😔
GAME_TAGLINE_LINE4: Win it all? You’re officially a legend. 🏆🔥
GAME_TAGLINE_LINE5: Step up, swing hard, and remember—this ain’t just ping pong, it’s a lifestyle. 👊🎯💯
LANDING_TITLE: 🏓 Smash, Spin, Win - Gang Gang Gang Style! 🏓
LANDING_BODY:
Test your reflexes and skills 💪
in the ultimate Ping Pong showdown! 🔥
Join the competition, 🏅
rise through the ranks, ⬆️
and become the ultimate champion. 🏆
Enter the Ping-Pocalypse 🏓
and show them who’s the boss! 👑
AVATAR_QUEEN_OF_THE_SPOONS: A sweet athletic girl... until she grabs her spoon. Then she turns into a seductive ping pong sorceress. 🍨
AVATAR_BOSS_LADY: Curvy. Bossy. Unapologetic. Just pray she misses. 💅
AVATAR_FINN: Glasses. Hoodie. Code by day, pong by night. 👓🧠
AVATAR_STABILITY: A sweet gamer girl... until she serves a perfect ping pong shot. Watch out she's ferocious! 🎮🏓
AVATAR_JUST_BORN: Sweet, cheerful, and totally clueless... until he finds himself in a ping pong match, where his Irresistable Vibes becomes his Secret Weapon! 🏓😂
AVATAR_GANG_GANGER: Strong and patient... but when it's time for ping pong, he hits with power and precision. He’s a tough opponent! 💪🏓
AVATAR_MASLINA: Smart and always smiling... just don’t expect him to wake up early for school. But when it's game time, he’s on point with his ping pong serve. 🏓🧠
AVATAR_INKA: An amiable coffee-lover... until a ping pong match heats up. Then he’s all focused, turning every game into a calm but deadly rally. ☕🏓
AVATAR_VAMP_BOY: In his rock band by day, but when the ping pong table calls, he’s the stylish show-off who always hits the coolest shots. 🎸🏓
AVATAR_BUREK: Never gets mad... but when it's ping pong time, he becomes the most cheerful challenger you’ve ever seen. Loveable and competitive! 🍰🏓
AVATAR_FISH: A nature-loving, game-making girl, who’s also got the skills to make ping pong a work of art. Positive vibes all around! 🐾🏓
AVATAR_WAR_MACHINE: Our baby girl, coding in her momma’s tummy... and already practicing her ping pong swings. She’s gonna rule the table one day! 👶🏓
